de.must.markup
Class DataPropertyPresentation

java.lang.Object
  de.must.markup.Dialog
      de.must.markup.PropertyPresentation
          de.must.markup.DataPropertyPresentation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Invokable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CookbookPresentation, UserPresentation
public abstract class DataPropertyPresentation
extends PropertyPresentation

Frame-like container to enclose data presenting components with database field association and controlling load action. Is used for delete confirmation as well. Used for property presentation of a single database record. It is meant to contain several markupables like e.g. DataTextPresenter
